  • Method Details

    • findMaxWeightByUserIdAndExerciseName

      @Query("SELECT MAX(ls.weight) FROM LogSeries ls JOIN ls.logExercise le JOIN le.trainingLog tl WHERE tl.user.id = :userId AND le.exerciseName = :exerciseName") Optional<BigDecimal> findMaxWeightByUserIdAndExerciseName(@Param("userId") Integer userId, @Param("exerciseName") String exerciseName)

    • findExerciseProgressByUserIdAndExerciseName

      @Query("SELECT tl.date AS date, MAX(ls.weight) AS maxWeight FROM LogSeries ls JOIN ls.logExercise le JOIN le.trainingLog tl WHERE tl.user.id = :userId AND LOWER(le.exerciseName) = LOWER(:exerciseName) AND ls.weight > 0 GROUP BY tl.date ORDER BY tl.date ASC") List<LogSeriesRepository.ExerciseProgressProjection> findExerciseProgressByUserIdAndExerciseName(@Param("userId") Integer userId, @Param("exerciseName") String exerciseName)

    • findInitialMaxWeightForExercise

      @Query(value="SELECT ls.weight FROM gymtracker2.log_series ls JOIN gymtracker2.log_exercise le ON ls.log_exercise_id = le.id JOIN gymtracker2.training_log tl ON le.log_id = tl.id WHERE tl.user_id = :userId AND le.exercise_name = :exerciseName AND ls.weight > 0 ORDER BY tl.date ASC, ls.weight DESC LIMIT 1", nativeQuery=true) Optional<BigDecimal> findInitialMaxWeightForExercise(@Param("userId") Integer userId, @Param("exerciseName") String exerciseName)

    • findLatestMaxWeightForExercise

      @Query(value="SELECT ls.weight FROM gymtracker2.log_series ls JOIN gymtracker2.log_exercise le ON ls.log_exercise_id = le.id JOIN gymtracker2.training_log tl ON le.log_id = tl.id WHERE tl.user_id = :userId AND le.exercise_name = :exerciseName AND ls.weight > 0 ORDER BY tl.date DESC, ls.weight DESC LIMIT 1", nativeQuery=true) Optional<BigDecimal> findLatestMaxWeightForExercise(@Param("userId") Integer userId, @Param("exerciseName") String exerciseName)
